Player History
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/15/1970 to a 3-year deal worth $5,250,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/9/1973 to a 1-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by Houston in 1975...
Injured on 8/13/1977 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/22/1979 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/1/1979 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/23/1980 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/3/1982 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 8/4/1982 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Earned first career win on 5/28/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1985, winning 2 games with a 1.17 ERA...
Traded from Houston to Chicago (N) on 4/18/1986 (Going to HOU: LF D. Justice, C M. Salas. Going to CHC: C M. Tettleton, CF L. Dykstra, 2B W. Backman, P D. Rozema)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1986, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Injured on 8/24/1987 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1988, winning 2 games with a 1.10 ERA...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/20/1990 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 9/22/1991 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
